name: Euro Contrôle Route
goal:
Euro Contrôle Route (ECR) is a group of European Transport Inspection Services working together to improve road safety, sustainability, fair competition and labour conditions in road transport by activities related to compliance with existing regulations.


ECR’s activities centre around four pillars:
• Coordinated cross border checks;
• Education and training;
• Harmonisation;
• Consolidated points of view / common interest and influence decision making process.
interests: Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Transport
euInitiatives:
Heavy Goods transport and passenger transport enforcement.

Focus on road transport acquis and exchange of enforcement data.
